topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 :from Crypto.Util.number import *
 from gmpy2 import *
 import random
 flag = b'******'
 flag = bytes_to_long(flag)
 nl = []
 cl = []
 def getn(bits):
 n = 1
 while n.bit_length() < bits:
 n *= random.choice(sieve_base)
 return n
 for i in range(8):
 n = getn(flag.bit_length())
 c = pow(flag, 7, n)
 nl.append(n)
 cl.append(c)
 print(nl)
 print(cl)
